data.eml:eml: A new Shivaphis species (Hemiptera: Aphididae) on the Chinese endemic plant, Pteroceltis tatarinowii

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Jiang, Liyun, An, Guangchi, Li, Weiwei, Qiao, Gexia (2014): A new Shivaphis species (Hemiptera: Aphididae) on the Chinese endemic plant, Pteroceltis tatarinowii. Zootaxa 3753 (4): 375-383, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3753.4.6
